cards.title: Cheers to 21 Years!
cards.centerfold: Welcome to the age where 'illegal' and 'irresponsible' just became synonyms! Time to trade in your juice boxes for cocktails and your bedtime for a bar crawl. Just remember, adulting is like folding a fitted sheetâ€”nobody really knows how to do it!
cards.back: Stay fabulous and enjoy every sip!
cards.artistInspiration: vibrant neo-expressionist style with ornate floral backgrounds and bold color fields
